title: Cascada Summer Trail Shirts
content:
Italian cycling apparel brand Cascada just launched a full line of summer Trail shirts using a new fabric comprising 95% polyester and 5% elastan. This material is soft as the classic cotton t-shirt, with a more classic aesthetic and less tech look. Breathable, light, and stretchy, the short-sleeve Trail jersey keeps you cool and dry on summer days thanks to its quick-drying polyester fabric, wicks sweat away from the skin, and promotes rapid evaporation.

Ideal for multiple outdoor pursuits, the Trail t-shirt becomes a perfect garment for whatever you have planned. Made in Italy.

See more at Cascada.
